channel.title: How many of RS Rules have you broken?
channel.description:
Enter the rules that you broke, along with the severity you broke them with (frequency)
Rules of Conduct Rule 1 - Offensive Language You must not use any language which is offensive, racist or obscene. Yes, 2/10 Rule 2 - Item Scamming You must not scam or deceive other players. No Rule 3 - Password Scamming Asking for another players password for any reason will not be tolerated. No Rule 4 - Cheating/Bug Abuse Any bugs found within the game must be reported to Jagex immediately Yes, 1/10 for not reporting a minor unexploitable bug Rule 5 - Jagex Staff Impersonation You should not attempt to impersonate Jagex staff in any way. No Rule 6 - Account Sharing/Trading Each account should only be used by ONE person. Yes, 6/10, shared all accs apart from my main Rule 7 - Macroing You must not use other programs to gain an unfair advantage at the game. Duh, 10/10, used SCAR since 1.10 Rule 8 - Multiple Logging-In If you create more than one RuneScape account, they must not interact. Yes, 8/10, considering that i had 12 aryan accounts simultaneous and a mule Rule 9 - Encouraging Others to Break Rules You must not encourage others to break any of the RuneScape rules. Yes, 4/10, I encourage my real life runescape friends to macro Rule 10 - False Representations This service must be used appropriately and treated with respect at all times. (meaning you dont report people falsely) Yes, 2/10, using the random reporter aryan script Rule 11 - Advertising/Website You are not allowed to actively advertise in the RuneScape game or RuneScape forums. No Rule 12 - Real World Item Trading RuneScape items must only be exchanged for other items/services within the game. Yes, 5/10, i sometimes buy accounts and often pbp pins Rule 13 - Asking for Personal Details To protect players' safety and privacy, you must not ask for personal details. No Rule 14 - Misuse of Official Forums Forums must be used respectfully at all times. No Rule 15 - Advert Blocking Please do not block the Adverts in free-to-play RuneScape. Yes, 8/10, using Adblock in Firefox
Whats Yours?

item.title: How many of RS Rules have you broken?
item.dc:creator: @Taylor Taylor
item.description:
@Taylor wrote:

8/10, I was macroing with Aryan back then

Read full topic
item.source: How many of RS Rules have you broken?

item.title: How many of RS Rules have you broken?
item.dc:creator: @Javacisnotrecognized _^_
item.description:
@Javacisnotrecognized wrote:

10/10 1, once, I explicitly said the word “fuck” multiple times
1/10 4, I discovered most of the POH bugs, but I didn’t exploit, not report them.
2/10 9, I often convince people to scam others
3/10 14, I was permanently banned from the forums, then I was unbanned and then I began flaming the person who had banned me in-game,
1/10 15, <3 javascript:document.getElementById

Read full topic
item.source: How many of RS Rules have you broken?

item.title: How many of RS Rules have you broken?
item.dc:creator: @Original_Daniel Original Daniel
item.description:
@Original_Daniel wrote:

I have broken every rule except scamming, forum abuse, reporting people falsely or staff impersonation repeatedly.

Read full topic

item.title: How many of RS Rules have you broken?
item.dc:creator: @mindtempest mindtempest
item.description:
@mindtempest wrote:

Enter the rules that you broke, along with the severity you broke them with (frequency)

Rules of Conduct
Rule 1 - Offensive Language
You must not use any language which is offensive, racist or obscene.
Yes, 2/10
Rule 2 - Item Scamming
You must not scam or deceive other players.
No
Rule 3 - Password Scamming
Asking for another players password for any reason will not be tolerated.
No
Rule 4 - Cheating/Bug Abuse
Any bugs found within the game must be reported to Jagex immediately
Yes, 1/10 for not reporting a minor unexploitable bug
Rule 5 - Jagex Staff Impersonation
You should not attempt to impersonate Jagex staff in any way.
No
Rule 6 - Account Sharing/Trading
Each account should only be used by ONE person.
Yes, 6/10, shared all accs apart from my main
Rule 7 - Macroing
You must not use other programs to gain an unfair advantage at the game.
Duh, 10/10, used SCAR since 1.10
Rule 8 - Multiple Logging-In
If you create more than one RuneScape account, they must not interact.
Yes, 8/10, considering that i had 12 aryan accounts simultaneous and a mule
Rule 9 - Encouraging Others to Break Rules
You must not encourage others to break any of the RuneScape rules.
Yes, 4/10, I encourage my real life runescape friends to macro
Rule 10 - False Representations
This service must be used appropriately and treated with respect at all times. (meaning you dont report people falsely)
Yes, 2/10, using the random reporter aryan script
Rule 11 - Advertising/Website
You are not allowed to actively advertise in the RuneScape game or RuneScape forums.
No
Rule 12 - Real World Item Trading
RuneScape items must only be exchanged for other items/services within the game.
Yes, 5/10, i sometimes buy accounts and often pbp pins
Rule 13 - Asking for Personal Details
To protect players’ safety and privacy, you must not ask for personal details.
No
Rule 14 - Misuse of Official Forums
Forums must be used respectfully at all times.
No
Rule 15 - Advert Blocking
Please do not block the Adverts in free-to-play RuneScape.
Yes, 8/10, using Adblock in Firefox

Whats Yours?

Read full topic
item.source: How many of RS Rules have you broken?
